frontmatter.title: Introduction
frontmatter.description: Get started with roadmap.mdx - MDX-powered roadmap rendering with live data

contents.heading: what-is-roadmapmdx
contents.content: roadmap.mdx is a package that lets you define roadmaps in MDX and render them to markdown with live data from your issue tracking system.

contents.heading: what-is-roadmapmdx
contents.content: Instead of maintaining static roadmap files that get out of date, you write MDX components that pull real-time data:

contents.heading: what-is-roadmapmdx
contents.content: This renders to markdown showing current progress, blockers, and completion status.

contents.heading: key-features
contents.content: Live Data: Roadmaps stay current with your issue tracker

contents.heading: key-features
contents.content: MDX Components: Write roadmaps as code with type safety

contents.heading: key-features
contents.content: Multiple Formats: Render to markdown, HTML, or custom formats

contents.heading: key-features
contents.content: Issue Integration: Works with GitHub Issues, beads, and other trackers

contents.heading: architecture
contents.content: roadmap.mdx integrates with the todo.mdx ecosystem:

contents.heading: architecture
contents.content: MDX Source: Define roadmaps in ROADMAP.mdx

contents.heading: architecture
contents.content: Compiler: Renders MDX to markdown at build time or on demand

contents.heading: architecture
contents.content: Data Sources: Pulls from beads, GitHub Issues, or Payload CMS

contents.heading: architecture
contents.content: Output: Static markdown files or API responses
